title: Louisville shooting: What to know about 4 killed, cop injured days after graduating
description: The four victims who were fatally shot in a mass shooting at a Louisville, Kentucky, bank on Monday morning have been identified by police.

title: Nashville Metro Council reinstates expelled lawmaker
description: Nashville Metro Council members unanimously voted to reinstate one of the two expelled Tennesee house members.

title: US determines Wall Street Journal reporter jailed in Russia 'wrongfully detained'
description: The State Department can now more effectively work to free Evan Gershkovich.

title: What we know about Kentucky's gun laws after Louisville shooting
description: Kentucky has been a permitless carry state since 2019 and does not require background checks.

title: Sentencing trial begins for ex-coach in wife's 1999 death
description: The sentencing trial has begun for a former Houston-area high school football coach convicted twice of fatally shooting his pregnant wife during what authorities say was a staged burglary more than 24 years ago

title: Military: Syria rocket attack on US base nets no casualties
description: The U.S. military says a rocket attack has targeted a base in eastern Syria housing American troops causing no injuries or damage

title: Family of Czech billionaire sues over Alaska crash death
description: A Czech billionaire died in a heli-skiing crash in Alaska in 2021.

title: Mom facing charges for 6-year-old who shot teacher
description: The mother of a 6-year-old boy who allegedly shot a teacher at his Newport News, Virginia, elementary school is now facing charges

title: 1 dead, interstate partially closed in Oregon after shooting
description: The shooting involved an Oregon State Police trooper.

title: DOJ asks appeals court for emergency stay of abortion pill ruling
description: The Justice Department told the 5th Circuit Court of Appeals a district judge's "extraordinary and unprecedented order" should be stayed pending an appeal.

title: WATCH:  Dad jamming with daughters at Taylor Swift concert is the joy we need this week
description: Carol Martin filmed her husband Bret singing and dancing along to Taylor Swift's "You Belong With Me" at the singer's concert with his three daughters.

title: Graphic version of Anne Frank book removed by Florida school
description: A conservative group challenged it, claiming it minimized the Holocaust.

title: Empty tank cars derail in Texas rail yard, no injuries
description: Kansas City Southern Railroad says three of its tank cars derailed but remained upright in a Southeast Texas rail yard

title: Blumenthal to leave hospital after surgery for parade injury
description: U.S. Sen. Richard Blumenthal is expected to be discharged from a hospital following surgery on a minor leg fracture he suffered during a victory parade for the national champion University of Connecticut men’s basketball team over the weekend

title: Police car firebombed in protest against NIreland peace deal
description: A police car in Londonderry was firebombed on the agreement’s 25th anniversary.

title: When exactly will India surpass China as most populous?
description: India is surpassing China’s population this month

title: Multiple casualties reported in shooting in Louisville, Kentucky
description: Multiple casualties have been reported amid a shooting in Louisville, Kentucky, according to police.

title: English doctors' strike could be catastrophic, official says
description: Britain is bracing for a four-day walkout by tens of thousands of doctors at the state-funded health care system

title: DeSantis to make 1st public appearance in South Carolina
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis is set to make his first public appearance in South Carolina, a state where votes will be critical if he launches an expected 2024 presidential bid

title: Romanian prosecutors search devices in Andrew Tate case
description: Romanian prosecutors have carried out forensic searches of electronic devices in the case of Andrew Tate, the divisive internet personality who is under house arrest on suspicion of organized crime and human trafficking, his lawyer says

title: Fire damages Massachusetts church after Easter services
description: A fire broke out at a Massachusetts church not long after Easter services, with more than 100 firefighters working to save the 114-year-old structure

title: Dalai Lama apologizes after video shows him kissing boy
description: Tibetan spiritual leader the Dalai Lama has apologized after a video showing him kissing a child on the lips triggered criticism

title: Avalanche kills 6, including mountain guides, in French Alps
description: French local authorities say the death toll from Sunday’s avalanche in the French Alps has risen to six, including two mountain guides

title: Fate of 8 Ohio cops in question as grand jury probes Jayland Walker shooting
description: A special grand jury will be seated Monday to decide whether to indict any of the eight Akron, Ohio, police officers involved in the death of Jayland Walker.

title: Temporary shelter-in-place issued as vessel carrying freon catches fire
description: The Tacoma Fire Department has issued a temporary shelter in place for residents in Tacoma, Washington, as authorities continue to respond to a fishing vessel fire.

title: 5-year-old girl shot and killed on California freeway, police say
description: A 5-year-old girl was shot and killed on a Bay Area freeway Saturday night just before 7 p.m., the California Highway Patrol said.

title: China military displays force toward Taiwan after Tsai trip
description: Taiwan's defense ministry says China’s military sent several dozen warplanes and 11 warships toward the island in a display of force following its president's trip to the U.S. The Chinese military earlier had announced “combat readiness patrols” as a w...

title: Jon Rahm rallies to win the Masters as Spanish stars align
description: Jon Rahm has become the fourth Spaniard to win the Masters

title: Man, 58, attacked by shark while surfing off Honolulu
description: Authorities say a surfer was in serious condition after being bitten in the leg by a shark off Honolulu
